categories: Category:Imperial II-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Certainty was an Imperial II-class Star Destroyer in the service of the Galactic Empire.
In 0 ABY, it docked at Bannistar Station to refuel. Here, it was sabotaged by Deena Shan, who threw a thermal detonator into the fuel line that was connected to its tanks.
